column2:
"You again? I've got no time for you with all
these D-arkers running around!"

"Damn things are endless, but they still got
the gall to run from me? And those little freaks
are fast. It's a friggin' pain in my ass!"

"They can't even scream. What's the point
of putting the hurt to 'em? You expect me
to kill 'em clean and quick? Boring!"

"Any D-arkers you find, you tell 'em I sent
you. Then you kill 'em in the most painful
way you can think up. You hear me?!"

"Do you think him cruel? I suppose it's
understandable."

"But where the D-arkers are concerned, my
views align perfectly with his."

"They merit only death, and I am all too happy
to give it to them. They are the enemy, in
absolute terms. Of humanity, and all life."
"For now, I bid you good day."

"……ちッ、オマエか。
今オマエに用はねェんだよ！
それよりもダーカーだ！"

"無尽蔵に湧いて来やがるくせに
逃げ足だけはむやみやたらに速い……
ああ……不愉快だ、うざってェ……！"

"声でも発するなら
嬲り殺しがいもあるってのに
ますますもって気にくわねェ……"

"……オマエもわかってるな。
ダーカーは見つけ次第殺せ。
出来る限り、苦しめて、だ。"

"……貴方様は、ゲッテムハルト様を
残虐だと思いますか？
思うかもしれませんね。"

"しかし、ダーカーの処遇については
私もまったくの同意見です。"

"殺しますよ。
私でも、容赦なく殺します。
あれは絶対的な敵ですから。"
